history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I would like transit directions.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER I want to go to forms and Mary.
TTS What is your destination?
USER Murray and Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
TTS Okay, going to murray avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER Highland
TTS Okay, leaving from n highland avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER Morrow
TTS Okay, going to morrow park city apartments. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER 8 A.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 08:00 am.
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 18 minutes, and you will take 1 bus..
Walk for about 6 mins to Negley avenue at Stanton avenue..
Take the 71A ,to Centre avenue at Aiken avenue. It will depart at 8:14am..
Walk for about 3 mins to 5250 Liberty avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15224, USA..
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER No.
